resources.string: ミドルテスト-スポーツ
Karasuno High
Karasuno High (Japanese: 烏野からすの高校こうこう Karasuno Kōkō) is a high school located in Miyagi Prefecture.
Nekoma High

Nekoma High (Japanese: 音駒ねこま高校こうこう Nekoma Kōkō), or Metropolitan Nekoma High School (Japanese: 都立とりつ音駒ねこま高等学校こうとうがっこう Toritsu Nekoma Kōtō Gakkō) by its full name, is a high school in Nerima Ward of Tokyo in Japan.
Aoba Johsai High
Aoba Johsai High (Japanese: 青葉あおば城西じょうさい高校こうこう Aoba Jōsai Kōkō), also known as Seijoh (Japanese: 青城せいじょう Seijō), and Blue Castle, is a private high school in Miyagi Prefecture.
Date Tech High
Date Tech High (Japanese: 伊達だて工業こうぎょう高校こうこう Date Kōgyō Kōkō) is a high school in Miyagi Prefecture.
Fukurōdani Academy
Fukurōdani Academy (Japanese: 梟谷ふくろうだに学園がくえん Fukurōdani Gakuen) is a private high school in Tokyo.
Shiratorizawa Academy

Shiratorizawa Academy (Japanese: 白鳥沢しらとりざわ学園がくえん Shiratorizawa Gakuen) is a private high school in Sendai, the capital of Miyagi Prefecture. Since the entrance exam is extremely difficult, most students get accepted by studying hard or through sports scholarships.
Inarizaki High
Inarizaki High (Japanese: 稲荷崎いなりざき高校こうこう Inarizaki Kōkō) is a high school in Hyōgo Prefecture.
Johzenji High
Johzenji High (Japanese: 条善寺じょうぜんじ高校こうこう Jōzenji Kōkō) is a high school located in the Miyagi Prefecture.
Nohebi Academy
Nohebi Academy (Japanese: 戸美のへび学園がくえん Nohebi Gakuen) is a private high school in Tokyo.
Tsubakihara Academy
Tsubakihara Academy (Japanese: 椿原つばきはら学園がくえん Tsubakihara Gakuen) is a private high school in Kanagawa Prefecture.
